title: Eyes and their care
creator_credit: Encyclopaedia Britannica Films and ERPI Classroom Films
brief_description: The structure, functioning, physiology and hygiene of the eyes are studied, the following in detail: learning how to judge distance; eye movements; light receptors; field of vision; night blindness; double vision; near and far sightedness; infections of and protection for the eyes.
